website_summaries.verdict: An affordable toothbrush that does its job well, but it may not provide any whitening benefits.
pros: Fine, soft bristles for a comfortable, deep clean
cons: Many don't notice any whitening benefits from the activated charcoal

customer_reviews.title: Love these toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: Love these toothbrushes. Although I use an electric toothbrush, this one is perfect for extra brushing during the day, in the car as I sometimes do, and anytime overall. The brush head is extremely comfortable and just feels different from reg hand brushes. My teeth feel much cleaner and so do my gums. Excellent brushes and very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hart

customer_reviews.title: A good product deserves a positive review.
customer_reviews.text: I love these toothbrushes! I've been using them for about three months now. The bristles are nice and soft, the curved handles makes them really comfortable to hold (therefore, making teeth cleaning easier), and on the opposite side of the bristles is a tongue cleaner-like surface. I feel like I'm cleaning my mouth well with these. The charcoal in the bristles is an innovative touch as well, which I like. I'll definitely be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Obi

customer_reviews.title: We've replaced our toothbrushes with this brand
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter. She used the charcoal toothbrushes made by Colgate but we are having a hard time finding them anymore. This brand, I think, is better. She said she like how soft they are but not too soft and they're easy to find on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Westie

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: every one needs to get the toothpaste too which is charcoal by Twin Labs
customer_reviews.author: mary james

customer_reviews.title: So plush!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the softest, most plush toothbrushes I have ever used. Even my partner, who usually uses medium to hard toothbrushes, fell in love with brush! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Carabajal

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I love these sexy black toothbrushes! Very amazing brushes! They have thin bristles and are very precise in getting into areas that normal brushes cannot get to. So far, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tooth brushes! They have a small head and soft bristles. Feels like I can reach more.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Gorham

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: this would have been great if it came in med/hard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful -- seem to get in all the cracks but still feel gentle maybe because the bristles are so fine.
customer_reviews.author: runjinxrun

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these brushes. I was concerned that the bristles might be too soft, and wouldn't do a good job of cleaning my teeth. Needless concern! I use them with my charcoal tooth powder. After a thorough gargle with cool water, I follow with a gargle for 2 minutes with a pulling oil. Another gargle, and I brush with an over-the-counter whitening tooth paste (using the same bamboo charcoal tooth brush). A final gargle with cool water, and I'm good to go. You certainly don't have to use the pulling oil or the whitening tooth paste. It's merely my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Feels comfortable on my teeth and works great. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: marshall

customer_reviews.title: on point
customer_reviews.text: these r great they feel great for young and old
customer_reviews.author: mOmof2wins

customer_reviews.title: and amazing toothbrush I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Most luxurious, soft, and amazing toothbrush I have ever used. Plus, the cheapest charcoal brush I have ever seen. Got my order two days after I placed it and have never looked back. LOVE THESE BRUSHES!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are fantastic. They're incredibly soft and my mouth feels really clean afterwards! 10/10, Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these toothbrushes. They have become a staple in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Vrakaman23

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter convinced me into buying these toothbrushes and I really was not sure about them. Now the whole family uses them and love them. The bristles are very soft and not at all harsh against your gums. If you are looking for an instant whitening this isn't your product, but it does whiten over a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Fatina Williard

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Stiffer than expected when soft is what I need. The black is a bit odd looking, after growing accustomed to white bristles - although the uneven bristles are very nice, not bad at all just wish they were softer.
customer_reviews.author: dawgiemama

customer_reviews.title: Decent toothbrushes but beware of lip balm included because it may make you pass out from the stench.
customer_reviews.text: Toothbrushes work just fine and are as expected but what is this god awful "lip balm" that's included? It literally made me almost vomit when I smelt it. Not sure what's in it but I don't think a fly would use it unless forced it stinks so badly.
customer_reviews.author: Mei

customer_reviews.title: Good basic tooth brush...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable tooth brush however, does nothing to clean the yellow out of my teeth which is why I bought it...thus the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: d. Titley

customer_reviews.title: Luxuriously Soft
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and silky feeling. They were a bit big so the fit wasn't right but still useable. I ordered a full and perhaps got a queen? Anyhow I really like the softness... So a good buy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Sharper

customer_reviews.title: NOT Soft toothbrush bristles
customer_reviews.text: Interesting reviews. Wondee what I received because these are any BUT soft! I woek rhe dental profession. These bristles will remive yit gum tissue they are so hard! Good for scrubbing grout but not my teeth and NOT why I bought these. I always order soft bamboo toothbrushes here on Amazon. Obviously I ordered the wrong brand. Don't stop here, keep on looking!
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought these
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice tooth brushes. They have a good shape, (my hand hols the grip with ease), the bristles are very soft, and the head is quite large. I cannot say if my breath is fresher or not, but I haven't received any complaints! I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Stiff bristles
customer_reviews.text: Works well with the charcoal toothpaste but has extremely stiff bristles. Made my entire mouth hurt for a week before breaking it in.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Nice tooth brush!
customer_reviews.text: Like this brush alot. The bristles are soft and feel good on my gums. I will be buying them again. If you like a stiffer bristle, then I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora F.

customer_reviews.title: Not your average toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: These are not your regular everyday toothbrush that we are accustomed to getting at your local Duane Reade or Riteaid or whatever is near you. These bristles are much more softer and I like that they are not all the same length. When brushing your teeth because the bristles are not the same length its a much cleaner feeling. Quality of the toothbrush is good and I never had heard of charcoal toothbrushes before until this year and figured I give it a try and I'm glad I did. I will not be going back to the regular toothbrushes again.
customer_reviews.author: Alice K

customer_reviews.title: Easy on your gums, great for your teeth
customer_reviews.text: They almost seem like they are too soft to do any good, but my teeth look and feel really clean after using them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Good Toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Not sure if the charcoal makes much difference, but I hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Mothlove

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I brush my teeth with charcoal, they get the hob done nothing spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Noah's MaMa

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, versatile and perfect to be used with the lovely Active Charcoal Tootpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Ceci

customer_reviews.title: Awesome way to brighten your smile!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth feel amazing every time I use this.. I smoked for 23 years and everyday they are whiter and feel smooth and clean.. LOVE these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Good Toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice toothbrush. Soft and cleans well, especially when using charcoal powder. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great bristles!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what great bristles, barely have to use any force and it feels like the bristles are doing deep cleaning. I enjoy using this toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: I.H.
